languages.text: "Конечно. Всем известна презренная репутация этого мерзкого грешника. Он покровительствовал ворам, контрабандистам и пиратам. Под его рукой цвели ереси и нечестивые культы. То, что он столь долго избегал наказания — вопиющая небрежность, которую я намереваюсь исправить в скорейшее время".

"Why wouldn't I? That vile rogue's infamy is known to all. He patronised thieves, smugglers, and pirates. By his leave, heresies and unholy cults flourished. That he has evaded punishment this long can only be described as gross negligence, which I intend to rectify in short order."
languages.original_text: "Конечно. Всем известна презренная репутация этого мерзкого грешника. Он покровительствовал ворам, контрабандистам и пиратам. Под его рукой цвели ереси и нечестивые культы. То, что он столь долго избегал наказания — вопиющая небрежность, которую я намереваюсь исправить в скорейшее время".

traits.locale_text: "Why wouldn't I? That vile rogue's infamy is known to all. He patronised thieves, smugglers, and pirates. By his allowance, heresies and unholy cults flourished. That he has evaded punishment this long can only be described as gross negligence, which I intend to rectify before long."

"Why wouldn't I? That vile rogue's infamy is known to all. He patronised thieves, smugglers, and pirates. By his allowance, heresies and unholy cults flourished. That he has evaded punishment this long can only be described as gross negligence, which I intend to rectify before long."

"Why wouldn't I? That vile rogue's infamy is known to all. He patronised thieves, smugglers, and pirates. By his allowance, heresies and unholy cults flourished. That he has evaded punishment this long can only be described as gross negligence, which I intend to rectify before long."

"Why wouldn't I? That vile rogue's infamy is known to all. He patronised thieves, smugglers, and pirates. By his allowance, heresies and unholy cults flourished. That he has evaded punishment this long can only be described as gross negligence, which I intend to rectify before long."

"Why wouldn't I? That vile rogue's infamy is known to all. He patronised thieves, smugglers, and pirates. By his leave, heresies and unholy cults flourished. That he has evaded punishment this long can only be described as gross negligence, which I intend to rectify in short order."

"Why wouldn't I? That vile rogue's infamy is known to all. He patronised thieves, smugglers, and pirates. By his leave, heresies and unholy cults flourished. That he has evaded punishment this long can only be described as gross negligence, which I intend to rectify in short order."

languages.text: “我为什么不这么做呢？那个卑鄙的流氓恶名昭著。他袒护了无数盗贼、走私犯和海盗，在他的保护伞下，异端邪说和邪恶崇拜盛行。我只能说，我一直以来都相当失职，居然让他逍遥法外了这么久。不过，我打算很快就纠正这个过错。”
languages.original_text: "Why wouldn't I? That vile rogue's infamy is known to all. He patronised thieves, smugglers, and pirates. By his leave, heresies and unholy cults flourished. That he has evaded punishment this long can only be described as gross negligence, which I intend to rectify in short order."

traits.locale_text: “我为什么不这么做呢？那个卑鄙的流氓恶名昭著。他袒护了无数盗贼、走私犯和海盗，在他的保护伞下，异端邪说和邪恶崇拜盛行。我只能说我一直以来都严重失职，居然让他逍遥法外这么久。不过，我打算很快就纠正这个问题。”

languages.text: 「何故だ？あの悪党の不名誉は全員が知っている。あいつは泥棒、密輸業者、そして海賊を後援していた。異端や不浄の邪教が栄えたのは、奴が連中を放置したせいだ。なのにこれ程まで長い間、罰から逃れさせたのは、単なる怠慢としか言いようがない。この状況も近々私が変えてやる」
languages.original_text: "Why wouldn't I? That vile rogue's infamy is known to all. He patronised thieves, smugglers, and pirates. By his leave, heresies and unholy cults flourished. That he has evaded punishment this long can only be described as gross negligence, which I intend to rectify in short order."

traits.locale_text: 「何故だ？あの悪党の不名誉は全員が知っている。あいつは泥棒、密輸業者、そして海賊を後援していた。異端や不浄の邪教が栄えたのは奴のせいだ。なのにこれ程まで長い間、罰から逃れさせたのは、単なる怠慢としか言いようがない。この状況も近いうちに私が変えてやる」

languages.text: «¿Por qué no? Todos son conocedores de la mala reputación de ese canalla. Se juntaba con ladrones, contrabandistas y piratas. Con su venia los herejes y los cultos impíos se hicieron más fuertes. Que haya eludido el castigo tanto tiempo es una grave negligencia que pretendo rectificar en breve».
languages.original_text: "Why wouldn't I? That vile rogue's infamy is known to all. He patronised thieves, smugglers, and pirates. By his leave, heresies and unholy cults flourished. That he has evaded punishment this long can only be described as gross negligence, which I intend to rectify in short order."

traits.locale_text: «¿Por qué no? Todos son conocedores de la mala reputación de ese canalla. Se juntaba con ladrones, contrabandistas y piratas. Gracias a él los herejes y los cultos impíos se hicieron más fuertes. Que haya eludido el castigo tanto tiempo es una grave negligencia que pretendo rectificar en breve».

languages.text: "Warum auch nicht? Jeder weiß um die Niedertracht dieses Schurken. Er hat Diebe beschützt, Schmuggler, selbst Piraten. Er hat Ketzerei und unheilige Kulte florieren lassen. Dass er seiner Strafe so lange entgehen konnte, lässt sich nur als grobe Fahrlässigkeit beschreiben. Ich werde diesen Fehler bald korrigieren."
languages.original_text: "Why wouldn't I? That vile rogue's infamy is known to all. He patronised thieves, smugglers, and pirates. By his leave, heresies and unholy cults flourished. That he has evaded punishment this long can only be described as gross negligence, which I intend to rectify in short order."

traits.locale_text: "Warum auch nicht? Jeder weiß um die Niedertracht dieses Schurken. Er hat Diebe beschützt, Schmuggler, selbst Piraten. Er hat Ketzerei und unheilige Kulte florieren lassen. Dass er seiner Strafe so lange entgehen konnte, lässt sich nur als grobe Fahrlässigkeit beschreiben. Ich werde diesen Fehler bald korrigieren."

languages.text: « Bien entendu. Les infamies de cette canaille ne sont un secret pour personne. Il traite avec des voleurs, des contrebandiers et des pirates. Sous sa gouvernance laxiste, l'hérésie et les cultes impies ont prospéré. Il se soustrait depuis trop longtemps à son châtiment et c'est une négligence majeure que je compte bien rectifier au plus vite. »
languages.original_text: "Why wouldn't I? That vile rogue's infamy is known to all. He patronised thieves, smugglers, and pirates. By his leave, heresies and unholy cults flourished. That he has evaded punishment this long can only be described as gross negligence, which I intend to rectify in short order."

traits.locale_text: « Bien entendu. Les infamies de cette canaille ne sont un secret pour personne. Il traite avec des voleurs, des contrebandiers et des pirates. Sous sa gouvernance laxiste, l'hérésie et les cultes impies ont prospéré. Il se soustrait depuis trop longtemps à son châtiment et c'est une négligence majeure que je compte bien rectifier au plus vite. »

languages.text: "Neden etmeyeyim ki? O alçak haydudun kötü namı herkesçe biliniyor. Hırsızları, kaçakçıları ve korsanları koruyordu. Kâfirliklerin ve din dışı tarikatların yayılmasına müsaade etti. Bu zamana değin cezalandırılmaktan kaçınabilmiş olması yalnızca devasa bir ihmal olarak tanımlanabilir ve bu yanlışı en kısa zamanda düzelteceğim."
languages.original_text: "Why wouldn't I? That vile rogue's infamy is known to all. He patronised thieves, smugglers, and pirates. By his leave, heresies and unholy cults flourished. That he has evaded punishment this long can only be described as gross negligence, which I intend to rectify in short order."

traits.locale_text: "Neden etmeyeyim ki? O alçak haydudun kötü namı herkesçe biliniyor. Hırsızları, kaçakçıları ve korsanları koruyordu. Kâfirliklerin ve din dışı tarikatların yayılmasına müsaade etti. Bu zamana değin cezalandırılmaktan kaçınabilmiş olması yalnızca devasa bir ihmal olarak tanımlanabilir ve bu yanlışı en kısa zamanda düzelteceğim."
